verses.text: \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w pleased|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w seek|strong="H7200"\w* divination: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* setting \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* towards \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* lifting \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* abiding \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* tents \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* rushing \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*,

\w He|strong="H0559"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* ire stopped \w up|strong="H5375"\w*:

\w The|strong="H0834"\w* hearer \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath beheld \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w vision|strong="H4236"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* falleth, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w so|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w opened|strong="H1540"\w*:

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H2895"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* thy tabernacles, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thy \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*!

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* woody \w valleys|strong="H5158"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w watered|strong="H4325"\w* \w gardens|strong="H1593"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* tabernacles \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* waterside.

\w Water|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w flow|strong="H5140"\w* \w out|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w bucket|strong="H1805"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*. \w For|strong="H4325"\w* \w Agag|strong="H0090"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w removed|strong="H7311"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* awry.

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1471"\w* \w strength|strong="H6106"\w* \w is|strong="H0410"\w* \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* rhinoceros. \w They|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w his|strong="H0398"\w* enemies, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* break \w their|strong="H0398"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* pierce \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*.

\w Lying|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w he|strong="H1288"\w* hath \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w as|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H0779"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H0779"\w* \w lioness|strong="H3833"\w*, \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* none \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* dare \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w rouse|strong="H6965"\w*. \w He|strong="H1288"\w* \w that|strong="H4310"\w* blesseth thee, \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* also himself \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*: \w he|strong="H1288"\w* \w that|strong="H4310"\w* curseth thee \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* reckoned \w accursed|strong="H0779"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0639"\w* Balac being \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, clapped \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w together|strong="H5606"\w* \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w my|strong="H2088"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* thou \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* contrary hast \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*.

Return \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w place|strong="H4725"\w*. \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* determined \w indeed|strong="H2009"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3513"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* honour thee, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath deprived thee \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* honour designed \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w answer|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Balac: \w Did|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou sentest \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* Balac \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w beyond|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w utter|strong="H1696"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* \w thing|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* own head \w either|strong="H0518"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: \w but|strong="H0518"\w* whatsoever \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*?

\w But|strong="H6258"\w* \w yet|strong="H6258"\w* \w going|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H3289"\w* thee \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*, \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

Therefore taking \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*, again \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* stopped \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w The|strong="H5002"\w* hearer \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, \w who|strong="H0410"\w* knoweth \w the|strong="H5002"\w* doctrine \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* Highest, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* seeth \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w visions|strong="H2372"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w who|strong="H0410"\w* \w falling|strong="H5307"\w* hath \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w opened|strong="H1540"\w*:

\w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*: \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*. \w A|strong="H7200"\w* \w STAR|strong="H3556"\w* \w SHALL|strong="H1121"\w* \w RISE|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* sceptre \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* spring \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* strike \w the|strong="H3605"\w* chiefs \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* waste \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Seth.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* possess Idumea: \w the|strong="H1961"\w* inheritance \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* manfully.

\w Out|strong="H0006"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w shall|strong="H3290"\w* \w he|strong="H3290"\w* come that \w shall|strong="H3290"\w* \w rule|strong="H7287"\w*, \w and|strong="H3290"\w* \w shall|strong="H3290"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w the|strong="H0006"\w* \w remains|strong="H8300"\w* of \w the|strong="H0006"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* Amalec, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Amalec \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H7225"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1471"\w* \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* ends \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* destroyed.

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Cinite: \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Thy \w habitation|strong="H4186"\w* \w indeed|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H4186"\w* strong: \w but|strong="H7200"\w* though thou build thy \w nest|strong="H7064"\w* \w in|strong="H4186"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1961"\w* thou \w be|strong="H1961"\w* chosen \w of|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* stock \w of|strong="H5704"\w* Cin, \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H1961"\w* able \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w continue|strong="H1961"\w*? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* Assur \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* \w take|strong="H7617"\w* thee \w captive|strong="H7617"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4912"\w* \w taking|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w parable|strong="H4912"\w*, again \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Alas|strong="H0188"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w when|strong="H2421"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w do|strong="H4310"\w* \w these|strong="H7760"\w* things?

\w They|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* come \w in|strong="H1571"\w* galleys \w from|strong="H3027"\w* Italy, \w they|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* overcome \w the|strong="H1571"\w* Assyrians, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* waste \w the|strong="H1571"\w* Hebrews, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w at|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* last \w they|strong="H1571"\w* themselves \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w perish|strong="H0008"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: Balac \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w came|strong="H1980"\w*.
